name: Southwest Community Corporation
description: Southwest Community Corporation at I.T. Bookman Community Center was built on the foundation of a communal need for multipurpose space within the community, with the purpose of embracing the needs of the surrounding Oceanview, Merced Heights, and Ingleside neighborhoods and serving it's residence better. Its partnerships with the Stonestown YMCA and Department of Aging and Adult Services continues to work to develop and manage quality activities and programs targeted to all age groups in the sur
